## Checklist

Please check the following before submitting:

- [ ] I have included all relevant environment information

- [ ] This issue aligns with the [SpiralOS Covenant](../COVENANT.md)

## Impact Assessment

**How severe is this bug?**

- [ ] Critical — System is broken or unusable
- [ ] High — Major functionality is impaired
- [ ] Medium — Minor functionality is affected
- [ ] Low — Cosmetic issue or minor inconvenience

## Epistemic Integrity Note

If this bug affects schema validation, provenance tracking, or epistemic integrity, please mark it as **Critical** and provide detailed information about the impact.
